message.content:
Subject: Notification of Leaving the Company

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that I have decided to leave [Company Name]. My last day will be [Date of Last Day].

I have enjoyed my time at [Company Name] and I am grateful for the opportunities I have had here. However, I feel that it is time for me to move on to new challenges and opportunities.

I want to thank you for your support and guidance during my time here. I appreciate the experience and knowledge gained while working with such a talented team.

Please let me know if there is anything specific you would like me to do before I leave, such as wrapping up any projects or providing documentation for my work. I am committed to ensuring a smooth transition and leaving the company in good hands.

Thank you again for the opportunity to work at [Company Name]. I wish the company continued success in the future.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
